scripts.android:build: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:/opt/gradle/gradle-3.4.1/bin && export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-amd64 && export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME && ionic cordova build android
scripts.android:debug: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:/opt/gradle/gradle-3.4.1/bin && export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-amd64 && export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME && ionic cordova run android --device -l -c
scripts.android: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:/opt/gradle/gradle-3.4.1/bin && export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-amd64 && export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME && ionic cordova run android --device
scripts.android:prod: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:/opt/gradle/gradle-3.4.1/bin && export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-amd64 && export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME && ionic cordova build android --aot --minifyjs --minifycss --release
scripts.cordova:clear: export ANDROID_HOME=$HOME/Android/Sdk && export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/tools && export PATH=$PATH:/opt/gradle/gradle-3.4.1/bin && export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-amd64 && export PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME && cordova clean
scripts.ab: jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore my-release-key.jks platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk my-alias && cd platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/ && /home/mishanya/Android/Sdk/build-tools/27.0.3/zipalign -v 4 app-release-unsigned.apk signed.apk
